column1: Smoque BBQ////BBQ Gumbo - 5 - This is the jewel in their crown.  It was oh
column4: full of brisket and andouille.  And it was not too spicy
column5: but had just a little kick.  It was listed as a special
column6: but I hope it's always available.  If not
column7: it should be!  Hopefully my next order can be this
column9: with cornbread and mac n cheese.  Yum!
